figure.label: Hill & Church of StaSanta Maria de los Angeles.

div.ab:
Quit Madrid at 9h Octob 24 very fine hot & clear to bridge of Toledo over the Manzanares, very fine strike off from it. Turn L. 38 p 9left. 9.38 Toll. At 10h a
[drawing: hill] hill X cross the river L. At 15 p 10 a road turns R right to Villaverde & beyond it a Vill Village & palace of the Duca de InfantadoDuque del Infantado (Duke of the Infantado). A Vill left under [drawing: hill] . At 11h Getafe large vill R & the hill & +church of La VergineVirgen de los Angeles L. 25 p 11 2d league. Post house Angeles Olives scattered & vines. 15 p 12 Vill R Pinto. 32 p 12 League 3d. 20 p 1 Val de MoroValdemoro, General Cuesta has a house there. large Vill or Town. 40 p 1 4th League. 15 p 2 League 4 ½. Post house Olives – 15 to 32.45 league 5. 15 p 3 at bottom of the hill & in the vale of MancanaresManzanares, having seen the vale of the Tagus from the top. on each side the road, rows double, of Trees. League 6. turn L. 35 p 3 X a great bridge over Manzanares, vale about 2 miles wide. Deer Trees of Royal Demesne begin. Very long avenue turning again R from the bridge. 20 p 4 L is an aquaduct & a wheel of 30 feet diam~diameter which throws up the water for the grounds. Enter thicker woods. 34 p 4 league 6 ½. 15 p 5. cascade of the Tagus a white muddy river and the palace. Gardens very shady. The town of Aranjuez very regularly laid out. wide streets. rows of trees in them – A large Inn full of people & Carriages. We met many on the road from Madrid.
div.note: King Wamba of pueblo de Bambatown od Bamba. his body translated from a +church he built there to Toledo. King Recesvinto built at at Pisnerga in 610 as an inscriptn yet says on a stone.
Wamba in 674 built walls & Towers round Toledo. with stones from Circus maximus &c.
Erexit fautore Deo rex inclytus urbem Wamba &c.With the support of God, the illustrious King Wamba erected the city etc.
Bridge of Alcantara at Toledo impassable in time of Ervigio successor of Wamba. This King sent a Duke or Governor Sala to repair it. Verses of Eugenius 3 archbishop confirm this.

Gothic monuments of Spain. DDon Juan Cean BermudezJuan Agustín Ceán Bermúdez collaborated with Eugenio Llaguno y Amírola on Noticias de los arquitectos y arquitectura de España..., 4 vols (Madrid: Imprenta Real, 1829).
Arabs in 713 came & copied from Egypt pointed arches. pretence of media luna for arcos de herradura.half-moon (or crescent) for horseshoe arches
frisos enriquecidos con lazos cintos plantas y letras floreadas. Con moldes y yeso.
Alfagias o patios. en vez de grades tenien ranques.
friezes enriched with bows, cinctures, plants and flowery letters. With molds and plaster High great rooms & great salons. Alfagias or patios. instead of grades they had ranks.
Kings Dairy very fine in the way.
